name: verifyDiscountedMochaRemovalViaRemoveButtonOnCartPage
description: Verify that the Discounted Mocha item in the Cart Page disappears after removing the other coffee cups via the 'x' button
descriptionHtml: Verify that the Discounted Mocha item in the Cart Page disappears after removing the other coffee cups via the 'x' button
statusMessage:
The following asserts failed:
	Discounted Mocha should not be present in cart after removing other items expected [null] but found [com.coffeecart.ui.component.FullItemComponent@69bdcfbc],
	Total button should not be displayed when cart is empty expected [false] but found [true],
	Empty cart message should be displayed  expected [true] but found [false],
	Cart counter should be '0' but was '1' expected [0] but found [1]
